comments.html: Is it possible to use any of the methods for outbound policing on 3560/3750 switches (not the E versions).  It does not seem like its possible on these platforms for outbound traffic only inbound.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
I am no switching guru (and my document covers solely software-based router platforms), but uncle Google provided this document when asked about "Catalyst 3550 policing".

Reading it, I would assume you can do inbound and outbound policing on Cat3550, but I haven't tried it.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
